advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
GET FEATURED:
Tag #PicPlayPost for a chance to be featured in our new Explore feed and on our official Instagram, Vine and Facebook accounts.  Please follow us @PicPlayPost.

#1 Top Paid App in over 40 countries
Apple's App of the Week (Nov 2013)

Use PicPlayPost® to create captivating stories with your photos, videos, GIFs and music.  Join millions around the world by creating and sharing a #PicPlayPost of:

+ Your hidden musical talent (singing #acapella or playing instruments)
+ Funny #Gif video collage
+ A favorite singer, actor and/or superhero!
+ Yoga poses 
+ Workout routines
+ An awesome vacation
+ Your pets
+ Anything you want

#PicPlayPost is equipped with a full set of features:

+ Export your video collages as an animated GIFs
+ Endlessly loop any videos or GIFs
+ Add up to 6 GIFs, photos and/or videos (up to 10 mins each) per video collage
+ Create #MusicPhotos by adding music to a static image(s).
+ Trim the segment of the video or song you want to import
+ High resolution image outputs 
+ Video Resolutions at full 30 fps 
+ Share your project on Instagram, Vine, Facebook, Youtube, Tumblr, Twitter, WhatsApp, Email and MMS
+ FAQ section. Many issues you encounter can easily be resolved by reviewing the FAQ.
+ For a full list of features, check out our website at Flambestudios.com/picplaypost

Have any comments?  Please Email Team@flambestudios.com
releaseNotes:
Now you can search and add...
- Music from Sound Cloud
- Videos from YouTube
- GIFs from Giphy.com
All within #PicPlayPost!

Improved precision for video trimmer
